# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the `wrap_string` function:

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    lines = String[]
    line = words[1]
    for word in words[2:end]
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= ' '
            line *= word
        end
    end

    lines = push!(lines, line)
    return join(lines, '\n\n')
end

println(wrap_string("A very long string that should be wrapped by this function", text_width = 20))
```
